mapper.insert: insert into t_buyuan (buyuanId, buyuanName, buyuanMark, buyuanMark1, buyuanMark2, buyuanType, buyuanType1, buyuanType2, buyuanDouble, buyuanDouble1, buyuanDouble2) values (#{buyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyuanMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyuanMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyuanMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyuanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyuanType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyuanType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buyuanDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buyuanDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buyuanDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_buyuan set buyuanName = #{buyuanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyuanMark = #{buyuanMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyuanMark1 = #{buyuanMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyuanMark2 = #{buyuanMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyuanType = #{buyuanType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyuanType1 = #{buyuanType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyuanType2 = #{buyuanType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, buyuanDouble = #{buyuanDouble,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, buyuanDouble1 = #{buyuanDouble1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, buyuanDouble2 = #{buyuanDouble2,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where buyuanId = #{buyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select buyuanId, buyuanName, buyuanMark, buyuanMark1, buyuanMark2, buyuanType, buyuanType1, buyuanType2, buyuanDouble, buyuanDouble1, buyuanDouble2 from t_buyuan where buyuanId = #{buyuanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
